title: How Teemo came to be
body: And thus the demon, spawn of all that is evil, was summoned into this realm

replies.body:
Haha thats awesome! 

Recently we also talked about Teemo and how he came to be =P

You love him, or you hate him--but if you love him, youâ€™re crazy. Teemo is the worst.
We talked to Jeff Jew (Producer), Colt Hallam (Senior Game Designer), and Brandon Beck (CEO) to delve into what went into creating League's greatest monster -- and more importantly, why someone would decide to inflict him upon the world.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-spotlight/birth-evil-teemo

Urban Dictionary:
The most bad-ass champion in the RTS game, League of Legends. Don't let his cuddly appearance fool you, because Teemo will **** your shit up - particularly with his mushrooms.
